title: Maintenance Hub â€” Draft rebuild trigger (no functional changes)

requirements.summary: Trigger a fresh draft deployment rebuild from the current repo state without changing application functionality or UI behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: A new draft build is generated from the current repository state.
The draft environment is accessible via a fresh draft URL and is not marked as expired at time of delivery.
No application functionality changes are introduced as part of this draft rebuild.

file_operations.description: Add a non-runtime, non-imported rebuild trigger document (e.g., with a short note and current timestamp) to force a new draft build/publish while keeping all app behavior unchanged.
